Text: Re Calpine Capacity Assignment Docs Cc Gerald Talk to you first thing in the am Stephanie Original Message From To Cc Sent Thursday December PM Subject Calpine Capacity Assignment Docs Attached for your review are drafts of the Capacity Assignment and Release Agreement and the Transaction No attached to the Master Firm Purchase Sale Enfolio Peter any input you would have on Article of the Assignment Agreement would be greatly appreciated Stephanie is trying to get these out as soon as possible tomorrow See attached file Calpine ConfirmdocSee attached file CalpineAssignReleasedoc

Fw Calpine Docseach of you had a Merry Christmas and enjoyed your time off Here is response from Joe at Calpine In addition to his memo we also need to verify intraday nomination procedures with PGT in the event of force majeure type interruptions at points other than Malin Since we cannot give force majeure protection at Alternate Points of Delivery they need to understand scheduling flexibility in the event a nomination needs to be redirected to Malin Joe also asked for more information on the renewal process on ANG and NOVA PeterEric we will need your assistance Does any information pertaining to this reside in their tariffs Please look at this first thing in the am We are going for signatures on Wednesday Regards Original Message From Joe Gorberg To Brad Barnds Janet Dixon Gary Eames Sent Tuesday December PM Subject RE Calpine Docs Stephanie per our conversation our legal group is reviewing the docs After making a first pass I have the following comments Typosspelling errors in the supply and capacity release docs Calpine would like a copy of the Enron Transporation agreements with PGT as it pertains to the supply agreement Capacity Release agreementCRA sb with Calpine Energy Services LP CES and not Calpine Corporation Article of CRA should allow for Calpine to have the right to take early assignment of capacity if the entire path of NOVA or entire path of ANG or entire path of PGT becomes available Article of CRA should allow for assignment using commercially reasonable standards Joe Original Message From mailto Sent Friday December PM To Cc Subject Calpine Docs Forwarded by Stephanie MillerCorpEnron on PM Gerald CT PM To Stephanie NRON cc Subject Calpine Docs Attached are the assignment agreement the Enfolio and the Confirm See attached file CalpineAssignReleasedocSee attached file Calpine ConfirmdocSee attached file CALPINE CORPORATIONdoc

Fw Calpine Docseach of you had a Merry Christmas and enjoyed your time off Here is response from Joe at Calpine In addition to his memo we also need to verify intraday nomination procedures with PGT in the event of force majeure type interruptions at points other than Malin Since we cannot give force majeure protection at Alternate Points of Delivery they need to understand scheduling flexibility in the event a nomination needs to be redirected to Malin Joe also asked for more information on the renewal process on ANG and NOVA PeterEric we will need your assistance Does any information pertaining to this reside in their tariffs Please look at this first thing in the am We are going for signatures on Wednesday Regards Original Message From Joe Gorberg To Brad Barnds Janet Dixon Gary Eames Sent Tuesday December PM Subject RE Calpine Docs Stephanie per our conversation our legal group is reviewing the docs After making a first pass I have the following comments Typosspelling errors in the supply and capacity release docs Calpine would like a copy of the Enron Transporation agreements with PGT as it pertains to the supply agreement Capacity Release agreementCRA sb with Calpine Energy Services LP CES and not Calpine Corporation Article of CRA should allow for Calpine to have the right to take early assignment of capacity if the entire path of NOVA or entire path of ANG or entire path of PGT becomes available Article of CRA should allow for assignment using commercially reasonable standards Joe Original Message From mailto Sent Friday December PM To Cc Subject Calpine Docs Forwarded by Stephanie MillerCorpEnron on PM Gerald CT PM To Stephanie NRON cc Subject Calpine Docs Attached are the assignment agreement the Enfolio and the Confirm See attached file CalpineAssignReleasedocSee attached file Calpine ConfirmdocSee attached file CALPINE CORPORATIONdoc
